evidence.claim: Complyance uses AWS services for their cloud infrastructure including EC2 and RDS.
The platform is built with considerations for HIPAA compliance.
Integration patterns include REST APIs for health data interoperability.
Complyance supports FHIR and HL7 standards for health data transactions.
X12 transaction sets are part of the data exchange capabilities.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of sending/receiving X12 transactions found.
